alert.note: Alert for Banks; Dawson; Fannin; Forsyth; Gilmer; Hall; Lumpkin; Pickens; Towns; Union; White (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 08 at 10:44AM EST until January 09 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of north central and northeast Georgia, including the following counties, in north central Georgia, Dawson, Fannin, Forsyth, Gilmer, Hall, Lumpkin, Pickens and Union. In northeast Georgia, Banks, Towns and White. * WHEN...From late tonight through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Storm drains and ditches may become clogged with debris. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Rainfall will overspread the watch area tonight through Tuesday evening. Rain will be heavy at times. Rainfall amounts of 3-4 inches are expected, but locally higher amounts will be possible, especially in and near the southward facing mountain slopes of NE Georgia. This watch will be evaluated this afternoon and evening for extension further south and west into metro Atlanta. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Banks; Dawson; Fannin; Forsyth; Gilmer; Hall; Lumpkin; Pickens; Towns; Union; White
